name: vita.coop
goal:
Vita.coop is a consumer cooperative and innovative healthcare solutions provider. Vita.coop is owned by its members and therefore it acts only in their best interests.
Vita.coop created its living will app to guide individuals with an easy process through their end-of-life care choices, minimizing the necessity for families to make critical decisions under stress or second guess those decisions for a lifetime.

At vita.coop we understand that end-of-life care can be difficult to consider and talk about. But we also understand how important it is to make these plans in advance.
interests: Consumers, Culture, Digital economy and society, Education and training, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, Public Health, Research and innovation, Youth
